snippet.title: RimWorld Console Edition | Pre-Order Announcement Trailer [ESRB]
snippet.description: Rimworld Console Edition is now available for Pre-Order on PlayStation and Xbox! Immerse yourself in the story-driven world of RimWorld Console Edition - survive extreme weather and take on brutal raiders as you help your colonists defend their home! Manage their moods and expectations – no two play-throughs are every the same! All driven by a reactive, AI Storyteller!
